mapper.select: SELECT B.OFFICE_ID AS officeId , B.CUSTOMER_ID AS customerId , B.PARTS_ID AS partsId , A.SUPPLIER_ID AS supplierId , D.WHS_ID AS impWhsId , D.WHS_CODE AS impWhsCode , C.IMP_STOCK_FLAG AS impStockFlag , A.SHIPPING_ROUTE_CODE AS shippingRouteCode , A.AIR_ETD_LEADTIME AS airEtdLt , A.AIR_ETA_LEADTIME AS airEtaLt , A.AIR_INBOUND_LEADTIME AS airInboundLt , A.SEA_ETA_LEADTIME AS seaEtaLt , A.SEA_INBOUND_LEADTIME AS seaInboundLt FROM TNM_EXP_PARTS A INNER JOIN TNM_PARTS_MASTER B ON B.PARTS_ID = A.PARTS_ID INNER JOIN TNM_OFFICE C ON C.OFFICE_ID = B.OFFICE_ID INNER JOIN TNM_WAREHOUSE D ON D.WHS_CODE = B.IMP_WHS_CODE WHERE A.EXP_PARTS_ID = #{expPartsId}

SELECT A.CALENDAR_ID AS calendarId , A.PARTY_TYPE AS partyType , A.OFFICE_ID AS officeId , A.SUPPLIER_ID AS supplierId , A.CUSTOMER_ID AS customerId , A.WHS_ID AS whsId FROM TNM_CALENDAR_PARTY A
A.OFFICE_ID IN
#{item}
ORDER BY A.PARTY_TYPE , A.OFFICE_ID , A.CUSTOMER_ID , A.WHS_ID , A.SUPPLIER_ID
